If you're in the mood for a superhero movie with a quirky and humorous tone, then "Super" would be a good fit. It perfectly encapsulates the boundless imagination and boundless pursuit of a young hero.

If you're interested in a dystopian science fiction film with complex characters and a thrilling plot, then "Divergent" would be a great option. The film explores the themes of individuality and societal division, and features intriguing twists and turns that will keep you guessing until the very end.
